import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class GeneratedWidget extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      backgroundColor: Colors.grey[200],
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('Quiz Results', style: TextStyle(fontWeight: FontWeight.bold, color: Colors.white, fontFamily: 'BubblegumSans')),
        backgroundColor: Colors.purple[600],
        elevation: 0,
      ),
      body: SingleChildScrollView(
        padding: EdgeInsets.all(20.0),
        child: Column(
          crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.center,
          children: [
            Text('Quiz Completed!', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 30, fontWeight: FontWeight.bold, color: Colors.purple[800], fontFamily: 'BubblegumSans')),
            SizedBox(height: 24),
            Container(
              width: 140,
              height: 140,
              decoration: BoxDecoration(
                shape: BoxShape.circle,
                color: Colors.yellow[300],
                border: Border.all(color: Colors.pink[400]!, width: 8),
              ),
              child: Center(
                child: Column(
                  mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
                  children: [
                    Text('85%', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 34, fontWeight: FontWeight.bold, color: Colors.purple[800], fontFamily: 'BubblegumSans')),
                    Text('Score', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, color: Colors.purple[600], fontFamily: 'BubblegumSans')),
                  ],
                ),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 24),
            Card(
              color: Colors.purple[100],
              elevation: 4,
              shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(16)),
              child: Padding(
                padding: EdgeInsets.all(20),
                child: Column(
                  children: [
                    Text('Total Score: 17/20', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 16, fontWeight: FontWeight.w500, color: Colors.purple[800], fontFamily: 'BubblegumSans')),
                    SizedBox(height: 12),
                    Text('Time Taken: 5m 23s', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 16, fontWeight: FontWeight.w500, color: Colors.black, fontFamily: 'BubblegumSans')),
                    SizedBox(height: 12),
                    Text('Accuracy: 85%', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 16, fontWeight: FontWeight.w500, color: Colors.purple[800], fontFamily: 'BubblegumSans')),
                  ],
                ),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 24),
            Row(
              mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.spaceEvenly,
              children: [
                ElevatedButton(
                  onPressed: () {},
                  style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
                    backgroundColor: Colors.pink[400],
                    foregroundColor: Colors.white,
                    padding: EdgeInsets.all(16),
                    shape: CircleBorder(),
                    minimumSize: Size(80, 80),
                  ),
                  child: Text('Review', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, fontWeight: FontWeight.w600, fontFamily: 'BubblegumSans')),
                ),
                ElevatedButton(
                  onPressed: () {},
                  style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
                    backgroundColor: Colors.yellow[400],
                    foregroundColor: Colors.black,
                    padding: EdgeInsets.all(16),
                    shape: CircleBorder(),
                    minimumSize: Size(80, 80),
                  ),
                  child: Text('Retake', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, fontWeight: FontWeight.w600, fontFamily: 'BubblegumSans')),
                ),
                ElevatedButton(
                  onPressed: () {},
                  style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
                    backgroundColor: Colors.green[400],
                    foregroundColor: Colors.white,
                    padding: EdgeInsets.all(16),
                    shape: CircleBorder(),
                    minimumSize: Size(80, 80),
                  ),
                  child: Text('Share', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, fontWeight: FontWeight.w600, fontFamily: 'BubblegumSans')),
                ),
              ],
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 24),
            Card(
              color: Colors.purple[100],
              elevation: 4,
              shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(16)),
              child: Padding(
                padding: EdgeInsets.all(20),
                child: Column(
                  crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
                  children: [
                    Text('Answer Breakdown', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 18, fontWeight: FontWeight.bold, color: Colors.purple[800], fontFamily: 'BubblegumSans')),
                    SizedBox(height: 16),
                    Row(
                      children: [
                        Icon(Icons.emoji_emotions, color: Colors.green[600], size: 22),
                        SizedBox(width: 8),
                        Text('Correct Answers: 17', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 15, color: Colors.green[600], fontWeight: FontWeight.w500, fontFamily: 'BubblegumSans')),
                      ],
                    ),
                    SizedBox(height: 12),
                    Row(
                      children: [
                        Icon(Icons.emoji_emotions, color: Colors.red[600], size: 22),
                        SizedBox(width: 8),
                        Text('Incorrect Answers: 3', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 15, color: Colors.red[600], fontWeight: FontWeight.w500, fontFamily: 'BubblegumSans')),
                      ],
                    ),
                    SizedBox(height: 12),
                    Row(
                      children: [
                        Icon(Icons.emoji_emotions, color: Colors.blue[600], size: 22),
                        SizedBox(width: 8),

                      ],
                    ),
                  ],
                ),
              ),
            ),
          ],
        ),
